title: Zumba Fitness: Rush
description: (Music Downloads Not Rated by ESRB)  The Games on Demand version supports  English.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor.  Feel the rush with the exhilarating dance fitness sequel to the original global smash hit! Get your body rockin’ with a red-hot blend of contagious choreography set to Zumba® music plus electrifying tracks by Pitbull, Nicole Scherzinger and more. Party yourself into shape with 42 all new routines and 24 international dance styles, from Bollywood to Merengue to Hip-Hop. Tons of Kinect exclusive features take your workout to the next level: more music, venues and superstar Zumba® instructors, plus online functionality and voice control. Follow your progress with the new calorie tracker and customize your entire workout. Dance hands-free with Kinect technology and play together with a friend to amp up your living room party!

childDownloads.title: "Hey Baby"  - Pitbull
childDownloads.description: (Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB) Drop it low and shake that booty with the hit "Hey Baby” by Pitbull. For music credits, visit www.ZumbaFitnessGame.com. Zumba® Fitness Rush is a Kinect Required game. (DLC does not support voice commands.)

childDownloads.title: Zumba Fitness Rush Bollywood Style Pack
childDownloads.description: (Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB) Lose yourself in exotic Bollywood choreography and build your track library with the Zumba® Fitness Rush Bollywood Style Pack. This 3-song pack includes the hit “Beware of the Boys” by DJ Punjabi, along with contagious Zumba® originals “Start the Fire” and “Bangalore Dreaming.” For music credits, visit www.ZumbaFitnessGame.com. Zumba® Fitness Rush is a Kinect Required game. (DLC does not support voice commands.)

childDownloads.title: Zumba Fitness Rush Challenge Daisy's Story
childDownloads.description: Daisy was a finalist in the ultimate challenge: how fit could she get in 90 days by playing the Zumba® Fitness Rush video game and making healthier diet choices? Get inspired by her life-changing results!    Daisy was compensated for her time and achieving her weight loss goals.  She was supported in her diet and exercise program.  Results not typical and were achieved in conjunction with a diet and exercise program. Diet and nutrition program not available with product.

childDownloads.title: Zumba Fitness Rush Flash Mob Video
childDownloads.description: Majesco Entertainment captured an epic flash mob on film to celebrate the launch of Zumba® Fitness Rush at the IHRSA Fitness Convention. More than 2,000 Zumba® enthusiasts gathered in downtown Los Angeles to dance in unison to the video game on the big screens with Zumba® creator Beto and celebrity Zumba® instructor Gina Grant. Feel the energy of this one-of-a-kind experience with a front row seat to the hottest dance-fitness party to hit the streets.

childDownloads.title: Zumba Fitness Rush Hip-Hop Style Pack

Zumba® Fitness Rush is a Kinect Required game. (DLC does not support voice commands.)
